entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse You are talking shit. California Arizona to name two where coronavirus is rampant.  Where were you when George Floyd was murdered.  What comments did you post. You went missing.  You are weak and a lapdog for Trump.
